title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$x+y \leq 2$$, which rearranges to $$y \leq 2-x$$. We make the line solid and shade below it since we have $$ \leq $$.\n##figure2.gif##
speech: We must graph  x plus y, is less than or equal to, 2 , which rearranges to  y, is less than or equal to, 2 minus x . We make the line solid and shade below it since we have  is less than or equal to .\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y \geq \frac{2}{3} x-1$$. We make the line solid and shade above it since we have >.\n##figure3.gif##
speech: We must graph  y is greater than or equal to, 2 thirds x minus 1 . We make the line solid and shade above it since we have >.\n##figure3.gif##
